about_the_game:
Stop by Baba’s Laundromat, home to stray pigeons, stinky clothes, and most importantly, the first free content expansion for Friends vs Friends coming in early July. It’s the coolest place in all Buddy Boulevard to get the latest quests, perks and bonuses. Certainly the cheapest!

Here’s a whiff of what Baba’s Laundromat adds to Friends vs Friends
  • 10 New Cards
  • 15 Cosmetics
  • 5 new skins
  • 1 New Weapon Skin

content_descriptors.notes:
Some blood effects when shooting opponents. 
Body part damage indicators, as exposed bones.
